metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18120 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A double-free bug in the read_gif function in gifread.c in gifsicle 1.90allows a remote attacker to cause a denial-of-service attack or unspecifiedother impact via a maliciously crafted file, because last_name ismishandled, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-1000421.

criterions.comment: gifsicle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
